member.name: T:PropertyTools.DataAnnotations.OptionalAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the property is optional.
member.remarks: The name of a property that controls the state of the property can also be specified. Properties marked with [Optional] will have a checkbox as the label. The checkbox will enable/disable the property value editor. Example usage: [Optional] // requires a property type [Optional("HasSomething")] // relates to other property HasSomething

member.summary: No modifier keys or mouse buttons are pressed.

member.summary: Specifies the effects of a drag-and-drop operation.

member.summary: The drop target does not accept the data.

member.name: F:PropertyTools.DragDropEffect.Copy
member.summary: The data is copied to the drop target.

member.name: F:PropertyTools.DragDropEffect.Move
member.summary: The data from the drag source is moved to the drop target.

member.summary: The data from the drag source is linked to the drop target.
